1.name: Down Boy!
1.text: First, play with your cock until it's hard. Then, flick it with a rubber band until it's not hard any more.

2.name: Mucky Pup
2.text: Ejaculate into your hand, then lick your fingers clean. Make sure plenty of it ends up on your chin.

3.name: Hippopotamus
3.text: Start a stopwatch and place it where you can't see it. Hold a coin against the wall with your forehead. Aim to stop after between 2 and 3 minutes, and repeat until you get it right.

4.name: Everyone's Butt Slut
4.text: Wear a butt plug for as long as you can. Every time you are mentioned in this server, give it a good squeeze.

5.name: I Hope It's Not Soup
5.text: The next time you can eat a meal alone, you must do so without using your hands.

6.name: A Cruel Finish
6.text: Put a nipple clamp or clothespin on each nipple. Leave them on for at least 10 minutes. Pull them off, instead of taking them off gently.

7.name: Self-Reflection
7.text: With a skin-safe writing implement, inscribe your three worst flaws on your belly, and each thigh.
